Text:
Sorry 2010Kaiser, but I can't install this software. Just after clicking "I agree", I'm gettin a prompt: "Invalid serial Key" and the game is over!
Any idea to make it work please ?

@Td2j

I've just re-tested Expert PDF 8 Professional on 2 different rigs and i can't replicate the error your getting. Try a re-install and make sure you follow the instructions contained in the INFO TAB exactly.
